name: Quest (Smeliot)
description:
Quest (title TBD) is a rhythm-based auto-runner in which you move between paths to collect coins and defeat enemies. You control two characters, the rogue and the princess, and can switch between them at any time. The character in front can use their ability--the rogue can swing his sword to defeat enemies, and the princess can shoot magic to destroy barriers.

I've worked on this game on and off for the past few years, never progressing past the prototype stage due to other commitments, but I believe it has the potential to turn into a pretty fun game.
